summary: The document is a Third Amended and Restated Credit Agreement dated November 13, 2025, involving Inland Real Estate Income Trust, Inc. as the borrower, KeyBank National Association as the administrative agent, and several other lenders. It amends and restates the Second Amended and Restated Credit Agreement from February 3, 2022, outlining terms for loans, interest rates, fees, and various conditions and covenants related to the credit facility.
